        Specified by:
        onSuccess in interface ResponseListener
        Parameters:
        url - - Return the last api url to check which api data needs to be fetched in the given context(Activity/Fragment)
        code - - Response code Option
        response - - A jsonString response that will be sent to the listener
        context - - Optional
